title: The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn, Werewolf Slayer Werewolf Storm Rising
description: After the Tom Sawyer adventure, as told by Clemens, Huck is driven to avenge the death of a friend whom he feels responsible for, at the hands of a werewolf. Undertaking this vengeance leads to Huck and Tom’s training with an experienced Indian werewolf hunter, and Huck’s hazardous trek down the Mississippi River of the 1830’s. A boy in his mid teens, forced to flee his home alone, scouring the county side to find and kill ruthless werewolves, while aiding a runaway slave, and facing all manner of human conflict along the way.
author: E.W. Fowler
